definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
an overall plan/to plan an entire project as a whole
united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线[tong3 yi1 zhan4 xian4])

sentences.english: As with everything else, look at nerves on a continuum.
sentences.chinese: 与其他方面一样，要将神经型视为一个连续统。

sentences.english: Especially from the F cardinality, some new ideas on the continuum hypothesis are shown.
sentences.chinese: 特别对于连续统假设这一世界难题可能有新的启示。

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系气藏的直接盖层是下二叠统梁山组泥岩层。

sentences.english: In of aristocracy, people's fates are not in the hands of themselves.
sentences.chinese: 贵族统窒时代忍们的狞运并不制握在自己手中。

sentences.english: The Maokouan and Permian formations in the Jiangsu Zhejiang Anhui region are mostly diachronous.
sentences.chinese: 苏浙皖地区茅口阶和上二叠统各组普遍穿时。

sentences.english: In this paper, the structural micro-fissures of Middle Carboniferous in Eastern Sichuan are divided into three stages and four types.
sentences.chinese: 本文将川东中石炭统构造微裂缝分为三期四种类型。

sentences.english: The middle Pleistocene loess has no collapsibility.
sentences.chinese: 中更新统黄土一般不具有湿陷性。

sentences.english: The system adopts logic decision method.
sentences.chinese: 该糸统采用逻辑决策的方法。

sentences.english: The Daping Varadium-Deposit is a sedimentary Varadium-Depossit formed Low cambrian black rock series.
sentences.chinese: 大坪钒矿床，为下寒武统黑色岩系中的沉积钒矿床。

sentences.english: First member of the YaoJia formation is a stratum of Late Cretaceous, and it belongs to PuTaohua oil-deposits.
sentences.chinese: 姚家组一段为上白垩统地层，属于葡萄花油层组。

sentences.english: This morning we'll conclude our study of the book of Acts.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我们是最后一次有糸统的读《使徒行传》。

sentences.english: Rather, it's the demonstrated awfulness of conventional mechanisms for defining the goals of software projects.
sentences.chinese: 统机制在定义软件项目目标上表现出来的尴尬。

sentences.english: Think of each drive being on a continuum.
sentences.chinese: 要把每种驱力视为一个连续统。

sentences.english: This saphire deposit is occurred in the Holocene alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 矿床赋存于全新统冲积层。

sentences.english: We consider that the oil source bed in the east of Junggar Basin is mainly of the upper Permian series.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为盆地东部地区的油源层主要是上二叠统。

sentences.english: The fault planes have a listric feature, slip-ped down along the soft layer of the Taiyuan Formation.
sentences.chinese: 断面上陡下缓，向下顺上石炭统太原组软弱层滑脱。

definition: to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
(army) commander-in-chief (archaic)/provincial military governor and civil administrator during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
